title: It’s Smoochy Time
description: Welcome to Smoochy’s Magic Jungle! Join the Rhinettes and do the Jiggy Ziggy dance and peek inside the Magic Cookie Bag.
quote: Wasn’t that fun in an awkward sort of way?
alt1: Smoochy cheering with a bunch of kids
alt2: Smoochy and kids about to look in the Magic Cookie Bag
alt4: Smoochy playing guitar and singing with the Rhinettes
